pr_title: [WFLY-12825]: Artemis network health check feature not configurable from WildFly

timeline.message:
[WFLY-12825]: Artemis network health check feature not configurable from WildFly

Adding the following configuration attributes:
* network-check-NIC
* network-check-period
* network-check-timeout
* network-check-list
* network-check-URL-list
* network-check-ping-command
* network-check-ping6-command

Jira: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/WFLY-12825

timeline.bodyText: @ehsavoie Thank you for this test coverage! Can you please add a brief description of test and passing criteria? It will help a lot our future selves.
